operations with iso collections

Functions

bool surfit::isos_delall ()
 removes all isolines from surfit_isos collection
bool surfit::isos_del (int pos)
 removes isoline from surfit_isos collection at 'pos' position

 reads isoline from formatted text file and adds it to surfit_isos collection
bool surfit::isos_load (const char *filename, const char *isoname=NULL)
 reads isoline from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_isos collection

 returns iso at 'pos' position in surfit_isos collection
iso * surfit::isos_first ()
 returns first iso in surfit_isos collection
iso * surfit::isos_last ()
 returns last iso in surfit_isos collection

 returns amount of elements in surfit_isos collection
